version_description:
- Public Universal Release, the app now supports iPhone & iPod Touch 5th gen!
Important: NOT compatible with iPhone4, iPod Touch 4th Gen.
- Added the ability to open midi files from Mail app and sharing website using "Open in" feature.

We would like to thank all of our early 10,000 adopters! we wouldn't be here without your help!

FAQ:
- No sound is coming from the app?
Please make sure the side switch on your device is not set to mute, we highly recommend using headphones for the optimal experience.

- Where do midi files go after i use "Open In" in Safari and Mail app?
All imported midi files will automatically be added to "My Midi Files" tab in the songs menu.

Your Reviews keep the updates coming! Don't forget to rate the app!

bug修复
性能提升
iPhone UI 优化
歌曲联系模式提升： 随时暂停歌曲开始按一个音符一个音符练习。点屏幕或者按下正确的音符来继续联系下一个音符

- Major bug fixes related to the online song library.
- Fixed a bug where some midi files can cause the app to freeze at the "Loading.." state.
- Fixed the bug that prevented access to the online features when the app is connected to a cellular network.

- Fixed iPhone 6S/6S Plus UI Scaling
- Fixed occasional freeze on startup.

- Support for new iPhones
- New Instrument! A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
   . Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
   . Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- Augmented reality support: Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.

*Available to premium subscribers

This is massive update brings you:

- Support for new iPhones
- Augmented reality (on supported devices): Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New Instrument: A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
   . Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
   . Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.
- You can now change the writing on the piano :)
- Support for Chinese interface and other languages

*Available to premium subscribers

This is massive update brings you:

- Support for new iPhones
- Augmented reality (on supported devices): Place the piano in your room and walk around it, the closest experience you will get to owning a real piano!
- New Instrument: A fully detailed antique mechanical player piano, featuring*:
   . Ridiculously detailed graphics with a custom paper roll for each song
   . Meticulously sampled piano sound recorded from a real upright piano with up to 8 velocity samples per key
- New background strings instrument
- Real time preview of songs in the songs browser: You can now "see" the structure of the song while scrolling without having to open the song.
- You can now change the writing on the piano :)
- Support for Chinese interface and other languages

*Available to premium subscribers

Added support for over 20 languages!
Improvements for AR workflow
Added the option to disable auto-play on start

- Added 3D Touch support
- Made the next/previous note buttons respect loop when enabled.
- Added seconds to see song play progress.
- Made it easier to know which song is playing.
- Made it possible to toggle the labels on the keyboard.
- Added the option to lock keyboard in Learn and Orbit modes.
- Made it possible to hide top toolbar (small arrow under settings menu icon)
- (New devices*) Piano roll notes now have rounded edges.
- (New devices*) Adde note labels to piano roll notes.
- Fixed bugs.

- Added support for new iPhones
- You can now customize pianos with your favorite colours and change room visibility.
- Piano roll notes now also appear in 3D modes and AR.
- Fixed a bug where tapping the correct notes wouldn’t take you to the next note if you’ve changed visible hands.
- Fixed song playback when certain settings are turned off
- Made it possible to change app language from settings
- Redesigned settings menu
- Other bug fixes and improvements
Added iPad ProMotion support: Enjoy eye-watering 120 fps graphics and responsiveness on the new iPad Pro!
